post:
Hey! 

Looking for a storage server without any of the hassle? Well, stop looking! We can provide you with a VPS running the super awesome and easy to use [DiskStation Manager ](https://www.synology.com/en-us/dsm/5.1/features)OS by one of the top NAS manufacturers, Synology!

The offer we have for the LET market is a low cost backup style VPS for a $7 a month.

The VPS's come with one **2Ghz vCPU** and **512MB RAM** along with a massive **200GB HDD** for your data. You can upgrade these at any time.

We can provide licences for windows or provide your own, if you would like a specific OS installed on your VPS then select custom at the order page and make sure to send us a ticket with a name/link to what you need.

Links:
Order page: https://secure.bigvps.io/cart.php?gid=8  
SpeedTest: [click here](http://bigvps.io/speedtest)  
100MB File: [click here](http://bigvps.io/speedtest/100MB.bin)
